## rgbToHSL() function

Converts a [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) to a [ColorHSL](./fast-colors.colorhsl.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rgbToHSL(rgb: ColorRGBA64): ColorHSL;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rgb | [ColorRGBA64](./fast-colors.colorrgba64.md) | the rgb color to convert |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ColorHSL](./fast-colors.colorhsl.md)

## Remarks

The alpha channel of the input is ignored
